sources.title: Horrors of Spider Island
sources.description: Survivors of a plane crash on a remote island find it is covered by spiders. When bitten, the survivors start turning into spiders! - IMDB Description

sources.title: Horrors Of Spider Island
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: Horrors of Spider Island
sources.description: A plane crash leaves a dance troupe stranded on a deserted island where a mutant spider bite turns the troupe's leader into a monster. This movie was featured on Mystery Science Theater 3000 ep. 1011. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

sources.title: Spider Island (1962) GRINDHOUSE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Exclusive MOVE CLASS Edition!
Stars: Alexander D'Arcy, Barbara Valentine, Dorothee Parker
Director: Jaime Nolan
After their plane crashes into the ocean, eight showgirls and a seedy nightclub owner wash ashore an uncharted, South Sea Island. The lush, tropical isle at first seems like paradise until one is bitten by a mutated, radioactive spider and transforms into a HIDEOUS half-human, half-insect fiend intent on devouring the remaining castaways!

CHAPTERS
0:00 Movie Class Introduction
2:06 The Horrors of Spider Island
01:18:27 Please Subscribe

sources.title: Horrors of Spider Island (1960) Directed by Fritz Böttger | Beholden the Blood of Beauty
sources.description:
Girls kept captive by a diabolical beast!
Stranded on an island with no way out, survivors of a plane crash find it is covered by spiders. When bitten, the survivors start turning into spiders!

Colorized version https://youtu.be/fr72odZCzEo


Original title: Ein Toter hing im Netz (1969) 
Alternative titles: Girls of Spider Island, The Spider's Web, It's Hot in Paradise, Body in the Web, Le Mort dans le filet, L'abbraccio del ragno, Um Homem na Rede, Ужас паучьего острова, 恐怖蜘蛛岛, L'île du sadique, La tela del ragno

Director: Fritz Böttger
Writers: Fritz Böttger, Eldon Howard, Albert G. Miller
Stars: Harald Maresch, Helga Franck, Alexander D'Arcy
Genres: Horror, Science Fiction, Exploitation

@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: En route to a show in Singapore, a troupe of beautiful dancers are stranded on a deserted island by a plane crash. Their routine of skinny-dipping and devising new skimpy outfits is interrupted when a radioactive spider bites their manager and turns him into a wild-eyed, furry-faced monster with three fangs and a passion for strangling.
metadata.Writer: Fritz Böttger, Eldon Howard, Albert G. Miller
metadata.Actors: Harald Maresch, Helga Franck, Alexander D'Arcy
